testcase.name: theStepShouldExecuteSuccessfullyWithoutThrowingAnyErrors
testcase.system-out: the step should execute successfully without throwing any errors: SUCCESS

testcase.name: TheFilesetShouldConsistOfTwoFiles
testcase.system-out: The fileset should consist of two files: SUCCESS

testcase.name: TheFilesetShouldContainOneHTMLFileWithTheHrefC00000Xhtml

testcase.name: TheHeadOfTheResultingHTMLfileShouldBeAsExpected

testcase.name: TheBodyOfTheResultingHTMLfileShouldBeAsExpected
testcase.system-out: The body of the resulting HTML-file should be as expected: SUCCESS
